message: I'm being generous with the first offer, but I'm sure you can understand why I want the bigger share. Let's get this over with!
Let's split it down the middle, no need to be greedy on the first offer
I'm willing to compromise, but I'm still the one taking the biggest risk here.  Let's get this done.
You're taking a big risk if you think you can get a better deal later
I'm starting to think you're being stubborn. This is getting closer to the final round, and we're both going to lose out if we don't agree.
You're running out of time, and I'm not getting any younger
This is my final offer.  I'm not willing to give up any more, and we're both going to get nothing if we don't agree.
You're really going to leave me with almost nothing? Fine, I'll take what's left, but you're not getting off that easy
